chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (m0 m1 : Map prec_list) (p : prec_list), (prec_in_state m0 p -> taille_0 p <= taille_1 m0) -> (prec_in_state m1 p -> taille_0 p <= taille_1 m1) -> prec_in_state (M2 prec_list m0 m1) p -> taille_0 p <= taille_1 (M2 prec_list m0 m1)

Premises:
taille_0 = fix taille_0 (l : prec_list) : nat := match l with | prec_cons _ y z => S (taille_0 y + taille_0 z) | prec_empty => 0 end : prec_list -> nat
M2 : forall A : Type, Map A -> Map A -> Map A
taille_1 = fix taille_1 (s : state) : nat := match s with | @M0 _ => 0 | @M1 _ _ y => taille_0 y | @M2 _ x y => Nat.max (taille_1 x) (taille_1 y) end : state -> nat
Inductive prec_list : Set := prec_cons : ad -> prec_list -> prec_list -> prec_list | prec_empty : prec_list
Inductive Map (A : Type) : Type := M0 : Map A | M1 : ad -> A -> Map A | M2 : Map A -> Map A -> Map A For Map: Argument scope is [type_scope] For M0: Argument scope is [type_scope] For M1: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _] For M2: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _]
prec_in_state = fun (s : state) (p : prec_list) => exists c : ad, MapGet prec_list s c = Some p : state -> prec_list -> Prop
borne_0_0 : forall p : prec_list, prec_in_state (M0 prec_list) p -> taille_0 p <= taille_1 (M0 prec_list)
borne_0_1 : forall (a : ad) (p' p : prec_list), prec_in_state (M1 prec_list a p') p -> taille_0 p <= taille_1 (M1 prec_list a p')
M2_eqmap_1 : forall (A : Type) (m0 m1 m2 m3 : Map A), eqmap A (M2 A m0 m1) (M2 A m2 m3) -> eqmap A m0 m2
M2_eqmap_2 : forall (A : Type) (m0 m1 m2 m3 : Map A), eqmap A (M2 A m0 m1) (M2 A m2 m3) -> eqmap A m1 m3
MapDisjoint_M2 : forall (A B : Type) (m0 m1 : Map A) (m2 m3 : Map B), MapDisjoint A B m0 m2 -> MapDisjoint A B m1 m3 -> MapDisjoint A B (M2 A m0 m1) (M2 B m2 m3)
MapDisjoint_M2_l : forall (A B : Type) (m0 m1 : Map A) (m2 m3 : Map B), MapDisjoint A B (M2 A m0 m1) (M2 B m2 m3) -> MapDisjoint A B m0 m2
MapDisjoint_M2_r : forall (A B : Type) (m0 m1 : Map A) (m2 m3 : Map B), MapDisjoint A B (M2 A m0 m1) (M2 B m2 m3) -> MapDisjoint A B m1 m3
in_M2_disj : forall (A : Set) (a : A) (m0 m1 : Map A), (exists c : ad, MapGet A (M2 A m0 m1) c = Some a) -> (exists c : ad, MapGet A m0 c = Some a) \/ (exists c : ad, MapGet A m1 c = Some a)
prec_contained_ind : forall P : prec_list -> prec_list -> Prop, (forall p : prec_list, P p p) -> (forall (p p0 p1 : prec_list) (a : ad), prec_contained p p0 -> P p p0 -> P p (prec_cons a p0 p1)) -> (forall (p p0 p1 : prec_list) (a : ad), prec_contained p p1 -> P p p1 -> P p (prec_cons a p0 p1)) -> forall p p0 : prec_list, prec_contained p p0 -> P p p0
Inductive prec_contained : prec_list -> prec_list -> Prop := prec_id : forall p : prec_list, prec_contained p p | prec_c_int0 : forall (p p0 p1 : prec_list) (a : ad), prec_contained p p0 -> prec_contained p (prec_cons a p0 p1) | prec_c_int1 : forall (p p0 p1 : prec_list) (a : ad), prec_contained p p1 -> prec_contained p (prec_cons a p0 p1)
prec_list_rect : forall P : prec_list -> Type, (forall (a : ad) (p : prec_list), P p -> forall p0 : prec_list, P p0 -> P (prec_cons a p p0)) -> P prec_empty -> forall p : prec_list, P p
prec_list_ind : forall P : prec_list -> Prop, (forall (a : ad) (p : prec_list), P p -> forall p0 : prec_list, P p0 -> P (prec_cons a p p0)) -> P prec_empty -> forall p : prec_list, P p
prec_list_rec : forall P : prec_list -> Set, (forall (a : ad) (p : prec_list), P p -> forall p0 : prec_list, P p0 -> P (prec_cons a p p0)) -> P prec_empty -> forall p : prec_list, P p
Nat.min_glb : forall n m p : nat, p <= n -> p <= m -> p <= Nat.min n m
Nat.max_lub : forall n m p : nat, n <= p -> m <= p -> Nat.max n m <= p
Nat.le_trans : forall n m p : nat, n <= m -> m <= p -> n <= p
Nat.mul_le_mono_nonneg : forall n m p q : nat, 0 <= n -> n <= m -> 0 <= p -> p <= q -> n * p <= m * q
Nat.mul_le_mono_nonpos_l : forall n m p : nat, p <= 0 -> n <= m -> p * m <= p * n
Nat.mul_le_mono_nonneg_l : forall n m p : nat, 0 <= p -> n <= m -> p * n <= p * m
Nat.mul_le_mono_nonneg_r : forall n m p : nat, 0 <= p -> n <= m -> n * p <= m * p
BinNums.positive_ind : forall P : BinNums.positive -> Prop, (forall p : BinNums.positive, P p -> P (BinNums.xI p)) -> (forall p : BinNums.positive, P p -> P (BinNums.xO p)) -> P BinNums.xH -> forall p : BinNums.positive, P p
M2_canon : forall (A : Type) (m1 m2 : Map A), mapcanon A m1 -> mapcanon A m2 -> 2 <= MapCard A (M2 A m1 m2) -> mapcanon A (M2 A m1 m2)
prec_c_int0 : forall (p p0 p1 : prec_list) (a : ad), prec_contained p p0 -> prec_contained p (prec_cons a p0 p1)
prec_c_int1 : forall (p p0 p1 : prec_list) (a : ad), prec_contained p p1 -> prec_contained p (prec_cons a p0 p1)
prec_occur_ind : forall P : prec_list -> ad -> Prop, (forall (a : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), P (prec_cons a pl0 pl1) a) -> (forall (a b : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), prec_occur pl0 b -> P pl0 b -> P (prec_cons a pl0 pl1) b) -> (forall (a b : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), prec_occur pl1 b -> P pl1 b -> P (prec_cons a pl0 pl1) b) -> forall (p : prec_list) (a : ad), prec_occur p a -> P p a

```coq
intros m0 m1 p H1 H2 H3.
destruct H3 as [c Hp].
rewrite Hp.
destruct (MapGet prec_list (M2 prec_list m0 m1) c) eqn:Hp'.
apply in_M2_disj in Hp'.
destruct Hp' as [Hp'|Hp'].
* destruct (MapGet prec_list m0 c) eqn:Hp0.
  apply H1.
  exists c.
  exact Hp0.
* destruct (MapGet prec_list m1 c) eqn:Hp1.
  apply H2.
  exists c.
  exact Hp1.
Qed.```
